items.sentence: Fishing is the only thing Tom ever wants to do.
Tom knows a lot of people who can speak French.
Tom knows better than to do that kind of thing.
Tom knows what he has to do to make Mary happy.
The meeting didn\'t last as long as I expected.
Tom persuaded Mary to invite John to the party.
Tom picked up the dry cleaning on his way home.
Tom picked up the stamp and took a closer look.
Don\'t fail to come here by the appointed time.
Why didn\'t you ever tell me that you loved me?
Tom will be very happy that he didn\'t do that.
Tom always gets the job done surprisingly fast.
Tom was beginning to realize what was going on.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary had to leave.
That was the most fun I\'ve had in a long time.
You don\'t understand what\'s going on, do you?
Tom is trying to get Mary to agree to help him.
Tom could\'ve phrased his answer more politely.
Tom thinks that he\'s better than anybody else.
Would it be OK to ask Tom to sing another song?
